item.title: 科技并购咨询公司 AXOM 聘请摩根士丹利的 Black 负责软件交易
item.description: 专注于技术领域的精品咨询公司 AXOM Partners 已从摩根士丹利聘请了投资银行家 Buzz Black，以加强对企业软件行业的覆盖。【原文：AXOM Partners, a technology-focused boutique advisory firm, has hired investment banker Buzz Black from Morgan Stanley, as it looks to strengthen its coverage of the enterprise software industry.】

item.title: 部长称巴西不会立即对美国钢铁关税采取报复措施
item.description: 巴西财政部长费尔南多-哈达德（Fernando Haddad）周三表示，南美国家不会立即对美国征收的钢铝进口关税进行报复，而是寻求谈判。【原文：Brazil's Finance Minister Fernando Haddad said on Wednesday that the South American country would not immediately retaliate against tariffs imposed by the United States on steel and aluminum imports, instead seeking negotiations.】

item.title: 花旗任命 Chris Cox 为投资者服务主管
item.description: 花旗集团已任命 Chris Cox 为投资者服务部主管，负责该华尔街巨头的托管、基金服务和执行服务业务。【原文：Citi has appointed Chris Cox as head of Investor Services, with responsibility for the custody, fund services and execution services businesses at the Wall Street giant, where a sweeping reorganisation of staff and structure continues.】

item.title: 业界称欧盟关税将对烈酒行业造成 "毁灭性 "打击
item.description: 大西洋两岸的贸易协会周三表示，欧盟对波旁威士忌等美国烈酒征收关税将对酒类行业造成 "毁灭性 "打击。【原文：European Union tariffs affecting U.S. spirits like bourbon whiskey will be "devastating" for the liquor industry, trade associations on both sides of the Atlantic said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国商务部长表示不会停止征收金属关税，将增加铜保护措施
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）表示，在美国国内生产得到加强之前，任何措施都无法阻止唐纳德-特朗普总统扩大征收25%的钢铝关税，而且特朗普将在其贸易保护措施中加入铜。【原文：U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said nothing would stop President Donald Trump's expanded 25% tariffs on steel and aluminum until U.S. domestic production is strengthened, and that Trump will add copper to his trade protections.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称，Blackstone 正在评估 Reese Witherspoon 的《Hello Sunshine》的选择方案
item.description: 四位熟悉此事的人士告诉路透社，Blackstone 正在为其好莱坞媒体公司 Candle Media 投资组合中最知名的资产之一 Hello Sunshine 探索各种选择，包括将其与另一家公司合并的可能性。【原文：Blackstone is exploring options for Hello Sunshine, one of the best-known assets in the portfolio of its Hollywood media company, Candle Media, including the possibility of combining it with another company, four people familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 莱茵金属首席执行官：大众奥斯纳布吕克工厂 "非常适合 "国防生产
item.description: 德国莱茵金属公司（Rheinmetall）首席执行官周三表示，大众汽车位于奥斯纳布吕克的工厂非常适合转为军工生产，这家德国汽车制造商正在考虑如何重新利用该工厂，其中可能包括出售。【原文：Volkswagen's factory in Osnabrueck would be a good fit for a conversion to military production, the CEO of Rheinmetall said on Wednesday, as the German carmaker considers ways to repurpose the site that could include a sale.】

item.title: 欧盟瞄准牙线和钻石以对抗美国关税
item.description: 从牙线到钻石，从浴袍到波旁威士忌，欧盟下月选择征收反关税的美国产品旨在让共和党投票州的工人和企业质疑美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易政策。【原文：From dental floss to diamonds, bathrobes to bourbon, the U.S. products chosen by the European Union for counter-tariffs next month are designed to make workers in Republican-voting states and businesses questions U.S. President Donald Trump's trade policy.】

item.title: 英国反垄断机构对苹果和谷歌的移动浏览器表示担忧
item.description: 英国反垄断监管机构称，其调查小组发现，由苹果和谷歌主导的移动浏览器市场对消费者和企业来说并不理想，这支持了其今年 1 月对该行业展开调查的决定。【原文：Britain's antitrust regulator said its inquiry group had found the mobile browser market, dominated by Apple and Google, was not working well for consumers and businesses, supporting its decision to launch an investigation into the sector in January.】

item.title: 口袋妖怪Go》制作商Niantic将以35亿美元的价格将游戏部门出售给沙特控股的Scopely公司
item.description: Niantic Labs 表示将以 35 亿美元的价格将其视频游戏部门出售给沙特阿拉伯拥有的 Scopely 公司，这家美国增强现实公司在未能重现 2016 年大热游戏 "Pokemon Go "的成功之后，将重点转向了地理空间技术。【原文：Niantic Labs said it would sell its video-game division to Saudi Arabia-owned Scopely for $3.5 billion, as the U.S. augmented reality firm shifts focus to geospatial technology after failing to recreate the success of its 2016 smash hit "Pokemon Go."】

item.title: 口袋妖怪Go》制作商Niantic将以35亿美元的价格将游戏部门出售给沙特控股的Scopely公司
item.description: Niantic Labs 表示将以 35 亿美元的价格将其视频游戏部门出售给沙特阿拉伯拥有的 Scopely 公司，这家美国增强现实公司在未能重现 2016 年大热游戏 "Pokemon Go "的成功之后，将重点转向了地理空间技术。【原文：Niantic Labs said it would sell its video-game division to Saudi Arabia-owned Scopely for $3.5 billion, as the U.S. augmented reality firm shifts focus to geospatial technology after failing to recreate the success of its 2016 smash hit "Pokemon Go."】

item.title: 全文--加拿大央行对未来利率走势持谨慎态度
item.description: 路透社渥太华 3 月 12 日讯）加拿大央行周三发布了行长蒂夫-马克莱姆（Tiff Macklem）的开场白，全文如下：【原文：OTTAWA, March 12 (Reuters) - The Bank of Canada released the following text of opening remarks by Governor Tiff Macklem on Wednesday:】

item.title: 加拿大央行降息抵制关税，未来行动将持谨慎态度
item.description: (与利率公告一同发布）【原文：(Releads with rate announcement)】

item.title: 全文--加拿大银行将利率下调 25 个基点
item.description: 路透社渥太华3月12日电）加拿大央行周三发表声明如下：【原文：OTTAWA, March 12 (Reuters) - The Bank of Canada released the following statement on Wednesday:】

item.title: 玻利维亚在美元和燃料短缺的情况下求助于加密货币进口能源
item.description: 玻利维亚国有能源公司 YPFB 的一位发言人和一位政府官员周三告诉路透社，该公司将使用加密货币支付能源进口费用，因为这个南美内陆国家正面临着美元和燃料短缺的困境。【原文：Bolivia's state energy firm YPFB will use cryptocurrency to pay for energy imports amid a painful shortage of dollars and fuel in the landlocked South American nation, a company spokesperson and a government official told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普新关税生效，企业阴霾加深
item.description: 周三，从运动服装到豪华汽车和化学品等商品的制造商们描绘了一幅消费者和工业健康状况黯淡的图景，加剧了人们对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战所造成损害的担忧，并再次打击了股价。【原文：Makers of goods from sportswear to luxury cars and chemicals painted a gloomy picture on Wednesday of consumer and industrial health, adding to concerns about the damage from U.S. President Donald Trump's trade wars and hitting share prices again.】

item.title: VIEW Tamer 考虑到关税形势，美国 2 月 CPI 可能不会令美联储让步
item.description: 2 月份美国消费者物价涨幅低于预期，但这种改善很可能是暂时的，因为对进口商品积极征收关税预计将在未来几个月内提高大多数商品的成本。【原文：U.S. consumer prices increased less than expected in February, but the improvement is likely temporary against the backdrop of aggressive tariffs on imports that are expected to raise the costs of most goods in the months ahead.】

item.title: 欧佩克（OPEC）数据显示，哈萨克斯坦是 2 月份欧佩克+石油协定的主要落后者
item.description: 欧佩克（OPEC）周三的数据显示，哈萨克斯坦 2 月份的石油产量占欧佩克+石油组织（OPEC+）总产量增长的一半以上，落后于其减产承诺。【原文：Kazakhstan contributed more than a half of overall OPEC+ oil production rise in February, lagging behind its pledges to reduce production, OPEC data showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 高盛首席执行官预计今年 IPO 数量将增加 - Fox Business
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）首席执行官大卫-所罗门（David Solomon）周三告诉《福克斯商业》，他预计今年的首次公开募股（IPO）将会增加。【原文：Goldman Sachs CEO David Solomon told Fox Business on Wednesday he expects initial public offerings (IPOs) to increase this year.】

item.title: 斯堪尼亚不顾破产承诺收购 Northvolt 电池组业务
item.description: 斯堪尼亚发言人周三告诉路透社，尽管瑞典电池制造商 Northvolt 已于周三宣布破产，但卡车制造商斯堪尼亚仍打算收购 Northvolt 的电池组业务。【原文：Truckmaker Scania still intends to buy Northvolt's battery pack business despite the Swedish battery maker having declared bankruptcy on Wednesday, a Scania spokesperson told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 随着通胀走低，美联储有望在 6 月恢复降息
item.description: 通胀降温可能使美联储决策者得以在今年晚些时候恢复降息，交易商周二押注从6月份开始，在2025年底前将政策利率下调三个季度点。【原文：Cooler inflation could allow Federal Reserve policymakers to resume interest-rate cuts later this year, with traders betting Tuesday on three quarter-point reductions in the policy rate by the end of 2025, starting in June.】

item.title: 美国 2 月份消费价格增长放缓
item.description: 2 月份美国消费者物价涨幅低于预期，但这种改善很可能是暂时的，因为对进口商品积极征收关税预计将在未来几个月内提高大多数商品的成本。【原文：U.S. consumer prices increased less than expected in February, but the improvement is likely temporary against the backdrop of aggressive tariffs on imports that are expected to raise the costs of most goods in the months ahead.】

item.title: 美国投资者寻求价值基金庇护
item.description: 由于担心唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易和其他政策会拖累经济，美国股票价格受到重挫，投资者正将现金转移到价值型基金，因为与成长型股票相比，价值型基金似乎不太可能在经济下滑时遭受损失。【原文：As U.S. stock prices get hammered on worries that President Donald Trump's trade and other policies could slow the economy, investors are moving cash to value funds which seem less likely to suffer in downturns than growth stocks.】

item.title: 南非将取消对低价智能手机征收的奢侈品税
item.description: 南非国库周三表示，南非政府已提议从4月1日起取消对价值低于2500兰特（约合136.37美元）的智能手机征收奢侈品消费税，以支持低收入家庭采用数字技术。【原文：South Africa's government has proposed to remove the luxury excise duty on smartphones worth below 2,500 rand ($136.37) from April 1 to support digital adoption for low-income households, the National Treasury said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Blackstone 支持特朗普的关税举措，称这将促进美国制造业发展
item.description: Blackstone 首席执行官 Stephen Schwarzman 周三支持美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税政策，称这将促进美国的制造业活动，刺激世界最大经济体的增长。【原文：Blackstone chief executive Stephen Schwarzman on Wednesday backed U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs, saying they will boost manufacturing activity in the United States and spur growth in the world's largest economy.】

item.title: 通用电气航空航天集团今年将向美国制造业投资约 10 亿美元
item.description: 通用电气航空航天集团（GE Aerospace）周三表示，将在 2025 年向其美国工厂和供应链投资近 10 亿美元，以增加新部件和新材料的使用。【原文：GE Aerospace said on Wednesday it would invest nearly $1 billion in its U.S. factories and supply chain in 2025, as it looks to increase the use of new parts and materials in its operations.】

item.title: 非洲支付系统 PAPSS 计划今年推出外汇市场平台
item.description: 一家旨在促进非洲大陆贸易的泛非支付基础设施提供商的首席执行官说，该公司正在试运行一个非洲货币市场平台，以促进该地区的跨境贸易。【原文：A pan-African payments infrastructure provider designed to facilitate trade on the continent is piloting an African currency market platform to boost commerce across borders in the region, its chief executive said.】

item.title: 独家报道：天然气进口需求增加，乌克兰押宝美国液化天然气
item.description: 乌克兰国家天然气运营商表示，乌克兰今年可能会通过德国、希腊、立陶宛和波兰的终端进口大量美国天然气，因为基辅正在努力应对俄罗斯对其基础设施的攻击所造成的影响。【原文：Ukraine may import large volumes of U.S. gas this year via terminals in Germany, Greece, Lithuania and Poland, its state gas operator said, as Kyiv struggles with the impact of Russian attacks on its infrastructure.】

item.title: 加拿大官员称加拿大将宣布对美国征收 298 亿加元的报复性关税
item.description: 一位加拿大官员表示，加拿大将于周三宣布对美国征收298亿加元的报复性关税，以回应美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的钢铝关税。【原文：Canada will announce C$29.8 bln in retaliatory tariffs on the United States on Wednesday in response to U.S. President Donald Trump's steel and aluminum tariffs, a Canadian official said.】

item.title: 杰克逊广场航空公司订购 50 架 A320neo 系列飞机
item.description: 美国飞机租赁公司杰克逊广场航空（Jackson Square Aviation）周三发表声明称，该公司已向空中客车公司直接订购了50架A320neo系列飞机。【原文：U.S. aircraft leasing firm Jackson Square Aviation has placed its first direct order with Airbus for 50 A320neo Family aircraft, it said in a statement on Wednesday.】
